thread.title: Nice aparthotel with perfect location
thread.title_full: Nice aparthotel with perfect location - Review of Helzear Champs Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Grzegorz_197
title: Nice aparthotel with perfect location
text: Very well maintained hotel with large (as for Paris hotel standards) apartments with well equipped kitchen. We were able to have perfect breakfasts in room (supermarket and bakery is just around the corner including famous Josephine). Location couldn't be better - so close to the Arc de Triomphe and famous Champs Elysees. Surely will get back when next time in Paris
